title: Sir Nicholas Grimshaw obituary
summary: An architect renowned for his innovative use of exposed structures and the iconic geodesic domes at the Eden Project has garnered significant recognition. His designs are celebrated for their sustainability and integration with nature. His work continues to influence architectural practices and environmental awareness globally.

title: Ireland v England: first men’s T20 cricket international – live
summary: The first match of a three-game T20 mini-series is underway, featuring an exciting contest between two teams. Rob Smyth provides an over-by-over report to keep fans updated on the action. Stay tuned to discover which team will emerge victorious in this thrilling encounter.

title: Former health official under RFK Jr: ‘I was fired for holding the line on scientific integrity’ – live updates
summary: Susan Monarez, the former director of the CDC who was fired in August, revealed that she met with Robert F. Kennedy Jr. twice during her brief 29-day tenure. Her meetings with him have drawn attention amid ongoing discussions about vaccine policies. The specifics of their conversations remain undisclosed.

title: Israeli minister attacks EU’s proposed ‘morally, politically distorted’ sanctions – Europe live
summary: Gideon Saar has issued a warning that any actions taken against his country will be met with a significant response. His statement underscores a commitment to national defense and sovereignty. Saar's remarks come amid escalating tensions in the region.

title: Surrey v Nottinghamshire, Sussex v Yorkshire, and more: county cricket, day three – live
summary: Live updates are being provided from various venues during the County Championship matches in Division One and Two. The report includes real-time scores, key plays, and player performances. Stay tuned for ongoing developments throughout the games.
